title: famososMuertos
author: famososMuertos
created_time: July 17, 2022, 03:04:12 AMLast edit: December 08, 2022, 06:04:07 PM by famososMuertos
content: ⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽Unlikely or Profitable!We are only a few months away from the start of the World Cup and everyone talks about the favorites and the bets have a tendency to go that way, but why not have a special look with the least likely.So the call is to those connoisseurs of selections national but especially those who live and vibrate the soccer of the teams listed in this thread, then, which are discussed in their local countries that could have weight in the result of a game, according to the request of this thread. ⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽The point (or the goal), this thread seeks that you name a maximum of three players, who are relevant in the performance of the following teams:⚽⚽IranSardar AzmounJapanAo Tanaka⚽⚽WalesGareth BaleQatarAkram AFIF⚽⚽Korea RepublicSon Heung-minSenegalSadio Mané⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽⚽These teams are the least likely to win the World Cup (<!1!)There a group whose probability is 0%: Cameroon, Saudi Arabia, Costa Rica. They could be included in the survey upon request, but any others must have a probability of less than 1%.This idea only applies to the group stage.I will update the table as I get information.Edit: outside Serbia and Morocco. Puerto Rico, which seems more interesting for analysis. Source:https://www.fifa.com/fifaplus/en/tournaments/mens/worldcup/qatar2022sorce: Getty imagesEdit: Aug 3

comments.author: famososMuertos
comments.created_time: July 17, 2022, 03:05:31 AMLast edit: November 15, 2022, 09:22:55 PM by famososMuertos
comments.body: Why is my country's national team not there?This thread seeks information with teams that have 1% or less to win the worldcup Qatar 2022.Do you want to know if some of those teams will be champions?No, it seeks to determine the best probability of those selections in their first three games. And analyze how influential it is that one or three of their best players can't play.others thread... World Cup?There are different threads that can help you;2022 FIFA World Cup in Qatar - UEFA Qualifiershttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5297982.0FIFA 2022 world cuphttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5392720.0:::OTHERS:::What is allin?This is hypothetical or figurative sense of betting everything.MIP!What percentage do you think the star of your country's national team influences the result?...Note that I appreciate any comments you make and you can feel free to skip these FAQs but be nice the thread is not moderated.Last Edit:   August 03, 2022.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Well from the teams listed in your first OP I think that all the teams are correct except maybe Senegal,I say so not because Senegal has high chances to win a competition of such level but because they also have a star player like Mane which has done great at Liverpool and I think he will also do great with the Bayern Munchen team in which he will play this upcoming season.So from the teams listed in the first post I think Senegal has the better chances compared to the other teams.For all other teams I agree,I don't know any star player in Japan,Iran,Korea (I know Son but he is not in the best of his age for such huge competition) and the other teams listed.

comments.body: Quote from: swogerino on July 17, 2022, 09:05:39 AM...//...:::+1Oh! but of course Mane, I know that player but sometimes we have...the "what country is that player from and we remember him more for his team in the corresponding league".I have added him and give him 100% most influential player in his Senegal team, since You did not mention any other.My slip:Senegal.with Manè.Qatari:1. Ecuador: X. Netherlands: 2Without Manè.Qatar: x. Ecuador:2. Netherlands: 2Allin?I do not decide for any Allin in this case.Updated:OP+Post.

comments.author: famososMuertos
comments.created_time: November 15, 2022, 10:04:26 PMLast edit: November 15, 2022, 10:29:33 PM by famososMuertos
comments.body: The World Cup arrived, only days...incredible.A good time to enjoy good football, the excitement of seeing our favorite national team and if that favorite team  is our country, how excited are you, not even the same English fans of PL or those staunch UCL fans, they can leaves it aside, although many will continue to be annoyed by such a long vacation in the middle of a season.The squad lists are already official in all the national teams, so according to the OP's countries, if these players are not there, I think the chances of winning are drastically reduced.Final Squad Lists:https://fdp.fifa.org/assetspublic/ce44/pdf/SquadLists-English.pdfIran;Sardar Azmoun.His age of only 27 years puts him at an impressive goal average, one of the best at the national team level. This player is so important that he was even included despite being injured.World Cup 2022: Iran include injured Sardar Azmoun in squad.https://www.bbc.com/sport/football/63618423Qatar;Qatar's players celebrating the country's first-ever Asian Cup title in 2019.Akram AFIFHe is one of the most outstanding players of the Qatar national team but in this particular case Qatar, I think the secret piece of this team is its coach Félix Sánchez Bas.Korea Republic;Son Heung-minThis is a vital player in the Korean team, his presence guarantees that this team will have a good performance, although of those mentioned in the OP I would say that this is the most engaged team as a whole, after Serbia. This team can be among the best 16.https://www.fifa.com/fifaplus/en/articles/world-cup-qatar-2022-official-squad-announcement-32-teamshttps://www.footballdatabase.eu/en/player/details/233967-akram-afifhttps://www.fifa.com/fifaplus/en/articles/qatar-world-cup-qatar-2022-fixtures-coach-key-playershttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/South_Korea_national_football_teamhttps://blog.worldwideticketsandhospitality.com/2022/11/15/football-world-cup-opposition-watch-the-lowdown-on-south-korea/https://talksport.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/5/2022/11/sardar-azmoun-iran-international-friendlyhttps://www.fifa.com/fifaplus/en/articles/qatar-world-cup-qatar-2022-fixtures-coach-key-players

This player is so important that he was even included despite being injured.World Cup 2022: Iran include injured Sardar Azmoun in squad.https://www.bbc.com/sport/football/63618423Qatar;Qatar's players celebrating the country's first-ever Asian Cup title in 2019.Akram AFIFHe is one of the most outstanding players of the Qatar national team but in this particular case Qatar, I think the secret piece of this team is its coach Félix Sánchez Bas.Korea Republic;https://blogworldwideticketsandhospitality.files.wordpress.com/2022/11/korea-republic-vs-ghana1-.jpgSon Heung-minThis is a vital player in the Korean team, his presence guarantees that this team will have a good performance, although of those mentioned in the OP I would say that this is the most engaged team as a whole, after Serbia. I think he can be in the top 16.https://www.fifa.com/fifaplus/en/articles/world-cup-qatar-2022-official-squad-announcement-32-teamshttps://www.footballdatabase.eu/en/player/details/233967-akram-afifhttps://www.fifa.com/fifaplus/en/articles/qatar-world-cup-qatar-2022-fixtures-coach-key-playershttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/South_Korea_national_football_teamhttps://blog.worldwideticketsandhospitality.com/2022/11/15/football-world-cup-opposition-watch-the-lowdown-on-south-korea/https://talksport.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/5/2022/11/sardar-azmoun-iran-international-friendlyhttps://www.fifa.com/fifaplus/en/articles/qatar-world-cup-qatar-2022-fixtures-coach-key-playersWhen it comes to Asian teams like Qatar, Iran or Korea we don't have a big visibility to the players. This is also a reason why it isn't possible to have good winning probability for these teams. European countries are a decade ahead than the Asian countries. Now compared to the European countries Asian countries are growing fast and the same could turn Asian countries winning probability high over the upcoming World Cups. For now it is like a new beginning.

comments.body: Quote from: KennyR on November 15, 2022, 10:27:11 PMQuote from: famososMuertos on November 15, 2022, 10:04:26 PM...//:::;;;...//...::What's the point of your quote, I seriously don't get it...Quote from: KennyR on November 15, 2022, 10:27:11 PMQuote from: famososMuertos on November 15, 2022, 10:04:26 PM...//:::;;;When it comes to Asian teams like Qatar, Iran or Korea we don't have a big visibility to the players. This is also a reason why it isn't possible to have good winning probability for these teams. ...//...,,,The probability of winning the World Cup is less than 1%, read the OP, so The point of this topic is to evaluate the specific possibilities of each national team (op)  and how a player can influenced in the success of a good result, which entails making a bet according to that risk.Quote from: KennyR on November 15, 2022, 10:27:11 PMQuote from: famososMuertos on November 15, 2022, 10:04:26 PM...//:::;;;...//,,, European countries are a decade ahead than the Asian countries. Now compared to the European countries Asian countries are growing fast and the same could turn Asian countries winning probability high over the upcoming World Cups. For now it is like a new beginning.Let's see if I understand!, these Asian teams don't have the level of European football...(We have discovered warm water!) Although today it is a yes and no, it depends.   The Korean team has been qualifying for the last 10 World Cups,, that is, maybe they has a better performance than many European teams, then is normal what in all confederations the distance is shortened, but at the level of individual matches, specific feats, win or tie a match with a large team from Europe, that is there latent for any World Cup match, it will happen at Qatar.Now to say that an Asian country is going to win a World Cup, according to your own words, that will not happen at least in the medium term, in fact, your comment is in contradiction.Quote from: KennyR on November 15, 2022, 10:27:11 PMQuote from: famososMuertos on November 15, 2022, 10:04:26 PM...//:::;;;...//,,,  For now it is like a new beginning.
